description: This file defines a FastAPI web application implementing a backend API for a simple todo list. It includes endpoint handlers for health checks, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting todo items, as well as returning configuration info. The file imports internal modules for database initialization and CRUD operations related to todos.

classes.name: HealthResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model representing the health check response message.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Endpoint to verify that the service is running, returning a health message.

methods.name: get_config()
methods.description: Endpoint to return current backend configuration details, such as database path.

methods.name: api_list_todos()
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve all todo items from the database.

methods.name: api_create_todo(payload: TodoCreate)
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new todo item with provided data.

methods.name: api_get_todo( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), )
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve a single todo item by its ID.

methods.name: api_update_todo( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), payload: TodoUpdate = ..., )
methods.description: Endpoint to partially update fields of an existing todo item.

methods.name: api_delete_todo( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), )
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a todo item by ID.

ctags.name: api_delete_todo
ctags.signature: ( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), )

ctags.name: api_get_todo
ctags.signature: ( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), )

ctags.name: api_update_todo
ctags.signature: ( todo_id: int = Path(..., ge=1, description="ID of the todo item"), payload: TodoUpdate = ..., )

ctags.name: message
ctags.pattern: /^    message: str = Field(..., description="Health status message")$/
